info_title: I'd love to hear from you
text_line_01: Please don’t hesitate to contact me either for professional or personal reasons,
text_line_02: I’m generally a friendly and empathetic guy, you can reach me even if you are considering my services but not sure or if you just want to connect and want to get to know me.
text_line_03: I’m at the moment open for full or temporary positions and as freelance.
text_line_05: If you rather call or write me on whatsapp:
name: name
subject: subject
